expo.name: Chowin-Out
expo.description: Chowin-Out is your best friend to find food.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your current location to find food around you
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to your photo library so you can upload food photos to analyze their ingredients and find similar food recipes
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take a picture of food to analyze its ingredients and find similar food recipes
